ProductName: Platform to support quality management procedures
ProductDesc1: OK1stPart is the tool par excellence for supporting Lean, Six Sigma, TQM, and SPC. It allows the creation of forms and the collection, analysis, and export of data from quality control procedures, ensuring the reliability of the processes and promoting their continuous improvement.
ProductDesc3: OK1stPart is the tool that will verify and validate your products and your production process, as well as keep the records for future analysis and conclusions.
FeaturesText1: Our wide range of functionality gives you total control.
FeaturesText2: We complement your work environment, and help you create a solid production cycle to simplify your business.
feature1desc: Recorded and detailed presentation of responses for each situation, through multiple summary reports (pareto diagram, capabilities, etc.).
feature2desc: Automatic backups, and support for exporting data in different formats, including Excel.
feature3desc: OK1stPart lets you create multiple profiles and quickly assign roles to them.
feature4desc: OK1stPart includes support for English, Portuguese, French, German and Spanish languages.
feature5desc: You can access the software on any device, including laptops and tablets.
feature6desc: The possibility of a private and isolated service infrastructure - your data is stored and managed by services and processes exclusively dedicated to you - with total guarantee of security and scalability.
feature7desc: Monitoring of events that deviate from normal standards, in order to allow their quick resolution.
feature8desc: Simple and intuitive creation of verification forms with various types of questions.
feature9desc: Aenean eu elementum ante. Nullam eros orci, mattis non pretium sed, semper nec ipsum. Quisque mi sapien, interdum eu ultrices eu, blandit a leo.
IndexPcText: Try it yourself and see what you think. In just a few minutes you will have access to a limited version of our software.
IndexPcTextAlt: Contact us to get access to a limited version of our software and try it for yourself.
ScreenshotDesc1: A panel with numerous statistics, to provide a very detailed and general view of the data for the user, with daily responses related to forms and filter automation.
ScreenshotDesc2: A simplified interface that allows you to create various types of questions and follow the entire process, from its creation to its approval and analysis.
ScreenshotDesc3: Possibility of analyzing in detail specific points in the production process regardless of the reference. These points are divided into 3/4 patterns such as: Interval, Accurate or Inaccurate. It is possible to adapt another type of control depending on your business. It has measuring instruments easily integrated into the system (comparators, micrometers, vernier, etc.).

wgyb2: OK1stPart was made especially for companies that focus on the continuous improvement, seeking to increase performance levels. With a focus on approaches such as Lean Six Sigma and Total Quality Management, this tool is essential for any company that intends to have any type of certification in the quality sector.
